text: Eyewitness (released in the UK as The Janitor) is a 1981 American mystery thriller movie directed by Peter Yates and starring William Hurt, Sigourney Weaver, Christopher Plummer, James Woods, Kenneth McMillian, Pamela Reed, Morgan Freeman. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1981 mystery movies Category:1981 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Yates Category:Movies about journalists Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Eyewitness (1981 movie)
